description: A graphic designer, or graphic artist as they are also known, is a person who places together images or motion graphics (or both) with typography in order to produce their work. They will primarily create such work for printed, published or electronic forms of media (newspapers, magazines, TV, film, internet) for use in advertising. Just as there are many jobs that can be acquired with this type of training, there are many speciality subjects within graphic designing. This ebook is a great guide to the world of graphic designing. To learn more about topics such as: 'How to Choose the Right Graphics Design Educational Facility' and 'The Role of the Graphics Designer' download your copy of this book today!
